title: Video: xxyyxx – About you
body:
16-year-old mega sensation **[XXYYXX](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/15609-video-xxyyxx-tied2u/ "Video: XXYYXX – Tied2U")** seems to be on our pages more and more, we even had a board meeting the other day considering a sister site that just covers him.

That’s a lie, we don’t have a board, we are considering it though.

His new video has everything I want from life; hot girls, hot girls smoking, hot girls walking, hot girls playing records and hot girls wearing animal masks.

God damn.
